org.apache.commons.collections15.collection
Class SynchronizedCollection<E>

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.commons.collections15.collection.SynchronizedCollection<E>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Iterable<E>, Collection<E>
Direct Known Subclasses:
SynchronizedBag, SynchronizedBuffer, SynchronizedList, SynchronizedSet, SynchronizedSortedSet
public class SynchronizedCollection<E>
extends Object
implements Collection<E>, Serializable

Decorates another Collection to synchronize its behaviour for a multi-threaded environment.

Iterators must be manually synchronized: 

 synchronized (coll) {
   Iterator it = coll.iterator();
   // do stuff with iterator
 }

This class is Serializable from Commons Collections 3.1.

Since:
Commons Collections 3.0
Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $ $Date: 2005/10/11 17:05:20 $
Author:
Matt Hall, John Watkinson, Stephen Colebourne
See Also:
